name: Internet for All
title: Universal Internet Access
description: In 2023, the UAE achieved 100% internet usage among both male and female populations, making it the highest in the world.

name: Youth in School
title: Near Universal School Attendance
description: With only 0.34% of adolescents out of school in 2023, the UAE boasts one of the lowest rates globally, ensuring education for nearly all its youth.

name: A Nation of Expats
title: High International Migrant Population
description: In 2015, 88.4% of the UAE's population consisted of international migrants, highlighting its status as a global hub.

name: Healthy Women
title: Low Female Mortality Rate
description: The UAE recorded a female adult mortality rate of 18.47 per 1,000 in 2023, one of the lowest worldwide, reflecting strong healthcare systems.

name: Young and Vibrant
title: Youthful Population
description: In 2023, a significant portion of the UAE's population was aged 25-29, with 11.42% of females and 14.67% of males, indicating a youthful demographic.

name: Few Elderly
title: Low Elderly Population
description: The UAE had a minimal elderly population in 2023, with only 2.11% of females and 0.69% of males aged 65 and above, suggesting a younger nation.
